# Copilot Instructions for ship-it

## Project Overview
This is the `ship-it` repository - a minimal Node.js/JavaScript project.

## Technologies
- Node.js
- JavaScript/TypeScript
- npm package manager

## Coding Standards
- Follow modern JavaScript/TypeScript best practices
- Use consistent code formatting
- Write clean, readable, and maintainable code
- Add appropriate comments for complex logic

## Testing & Quality
- Write tests for new functionality when test infrastructure exists
- Run existing tests before committing changes
- Ensure code passes linting and formatting checks

## Project Structure
- Keep the project structure simple and organized
- Place configuration files in the root directory
- Use `.github/` directory for GitHub-specific configurations

## Best Practices
- Make minimal, focused changes
- Update documentation when making significant changes
- Follow existing patterns and conventions in the codebase
- Use existing libraries and tools from the project's dependencies
